issue.title: [CI] Use "concurrency" setting on Github Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12895](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12895). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're currently using a dedicated Github Actions to cancel previous jobs when a new job is queued. It seems this now can be done better using the "concurrency" setting (unfortunately in beta):
https://docs.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#concurrency
